description:
# Let’s create a Lead

A lead is a potential customer who might be interested in your products or services.

In ERPNext, you can create Leads manually or automate creation through multiple sources like the Email, Contact us page of the website generated from ERPNext and APIs. Once the lead is captured in ERPNext, you can further assign it to your sales colleague, and ensure timely reminders for the follow-up.
name: Create Lead
title: Lead
